title: Stage 1
text: Elaborate the project proposal and set up the project web site.

title: Stage 2
text: In this stage, you should examine and understand the problem space. Who are the main users of the system? What tasks users want to perform with the system? What functionalities should be made available by the system? How is the work environment?

title: Stage 3
text: In this stage you are going to develop the first prototype of your system. It will be a throwaway prototype, which should be able to handle at least 3 scenarios described in the task analysis.
